alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Henry; Johnson; Lafayette; Pettis; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 2:20AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Henry, Pettis, southern Saline, southeastern Lafayette, western Cooper and eastern Johnson Counties through 245 AM CST... At 219 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Corder to 8 miles east of Oak Grove to near Leeton. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Warrensburg, Marshall, Windsor, Knob Noster, Concordia, Sweet Springs, Whiteman Air Force Base, La Monte, Smithton, Leeton, Green Ridge, Calhoun, Otterville, Corder, Alma, Blackburn, Houstonia, Whiteman Afb and Coal. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 52 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Cooper; Henry; Johnson; Lafayette; Pettis; Saline
